title: I got Medieval Twitch skin shard but can't redeem it

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body: I got the shard but can't redeem it.

replies.body: I got the same exact skin today and same problem happend to me

Hey CodemanTheBeast - did this get resolved? Let me know if i need to look into it 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}
I got grey warwick and im scared about it

I'm not sure. I feel that if I get a shard I should be able to unlock it. That's how the system works. For any skins that aren't available in the game they should not be part of a shard you can obtain.

Its also not working for my other skins too
i just tried on a cho'gath skin and same thing.

Sounds like a server delay to me. Visually, you got the skin, but the server hasn't caught up with it yet.
And so it doesn't know to do when you try to open it, and just pops up an error.

I'd give it an hour or so at the most - client restart before trying it again - and then it _should_(™) work.

Unless the honour system has been spaghetti coded as well.

> [{quoted}](name=PaladinNO,realm=EUNE,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=7AVcxLQy,comment-id=0000000000000000,timestamp=2017-08-04T16:48:28.959+0000)

well i posted about the same thing but for a champion and i dont know what to do because i really want to play the champion but it wont work
